data.title: List of OS X PowerPC games
data.text:
This is an auto-generated list of games known to have a PowerPC macOS version, and are thus believed to be playable on Mac OS X 10.0 Cheetah through 10.5 Leopard.

Note that PowerPC Macs up to OS X 10.4 Tiger are also able to play many Mac OS 8 and 9 games through Classic Mode.

Some of these games may be playable on Intel Macs from 10.4 Tiger through 10.6 Snow Leopard.[1]

Total count of all tables below: 504

Auto-populated list

Native support (PowerPC only)

Games where potential players would need to acquire a PowerPC Mac.

Total number of games: 145

Native support (PowerPC and Intel CPUs)

Games that can also run on Intel 32-bit Mac versions.

Total number of games: 336

Hackable support

For instance source ports that make it possible to convert a normally non-PowerPC game to PowerPC.

Total number of games: 20

Limited support

For instance cases where the game boots, but where most critical gameplay elements no longer work due to a lack of updates.

Total number of games: 3
